title: Google\Cloud\NetworkConnectivity\V1\PolicyBasedRoute\VirtualMachine
name: VirtualMachine
description:
VM instances to which this policy based route applies to.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.networkconnectivity.v1.PolicyBasedRoute.VirtualMachine

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.tags
params.description: Optional. A list of VM instance tags to which this policy based route applies to. VM instances that have ANY of tags specified here will install this PBR.
